moves.1. e4:
Smothered Mate And Curses.

How NOT to play chess.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Nd4: My favourite opening but this time my opponent tries a less used approach to it.
moves.4. Nxe5: I'm greedy. And I get a shot at that f7 pawn right?
moves.4... Qg5 5. Nxf7: Well this is all going swimmingly isn't it.
moves.6... Qxe4+: Ah. This is where I start to realise that the wonderful start has somehow gone somewhat wrong. Still I can stick the bishop back and just lose the knight. So one minor piece, not so bad huh?
moves.7. Be2 Nf3#: Oh. I'm just going to go and cry now. That was MEAN!
